Texto: 
normal
none
• av fistula
• enlarged straight sinus due to
straight sinus aneurysm
• pineal region neoplasm (germ cell tumor, pineal tumor)
• deep venous hypertension:
» dural avm
» pial (parenchymal) avm
» dural avf
» hypoplastic distal straight sinus
4 year old boy with speech delay
this case is unusual because the av fistual drains into the straight sinus rather than the vein of galen.  because this is not a high output shunt the patient did not present with the usual findings of cardiac failure.
the lesion is thought to be asymptomatic
